test.name: dns
test.label: DNS Test
test.description: Verify that the DNS server(s) supplied by the DHCP server can properly resolve the SIP domain.
test.longDescription: Verify that the DNS server(s) supplied by the network's DHCP server can properly resolve the given SIP domain and that the information returned is valid.

result.msg: SRV target could not be resolved.
result.description: Name resolution of the specified SIP domain returned one or more SRV records which specified an unreachable host. Ensure that the SRV records being supplied by the DNS server(s) are properly configured. Please see the test log for further details.
The specified SIP domain could not be resolved. Verify that the DNS server(s) have been properly provisioned for this domain.
The address that the specified SIP domain resolved to does not respond to ICMP pings. Verify that the server is running and reachable from this network.
